data.title: Occult & Obscure Clothing
data.meta_description: Find underground film shirts. Shop hundreds of unique obscure, cult, and occult art, music and media shirt designs. Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!
data.text:
Night Channels clothing usually ships within 3-5 days.

Some orders CAN TAKE UP TO 10 BUSINESS DAYS TO SHIP since they are made to order.

@-'-,--

You may receive a shipping notification and a tracking number multiple days before your order actually leaves our distribution center. If you see that your order has been in a PENDING state for a while, don't worry! This is normal.

International items can take up to 3 weeks to arrive (or occasionally longer if there are issues with customs.)

@-'-,--

We charge $5.95 for the first T-Shirt or $8.90 for the first hoodie + $2.95 for each additional T-Shirt or $5.90 for each additional hoodie within the United States.

T-Shirts shipped to Canada are $9.95 for the first and $3.95 for each additional. Hoodies to Canada are $13.90 for the first and $7.90 for each additional.

International orders (excluding Canada) cost $15.95 for the first T-Shirt or $19.90 for the first hoodie + $3.95 for each additional shirt or $7.90 for each additional hoodie. Larger international orders may be subject to higher fees.

@-'-,--

All orders ship with tracking and you will receive an email notification when your order goes out. Please make sure to provide your correct shipping address when ordering! If your order is returned to us due to an incorrect shipping address, you must pay to have it re-shipped. You cannot cancel an order after providing an incorrect address.

Items purchased directly from our website may be returned within 14 days from the date of shipment for a full refund to the original form of payment or a store credit for the full price of the item(s). The item(s) must be unopened, unworn, and without any visible damage.

The total amount refunded will be credited to your payment method that was used at the time of purchase (minus shipping) or as store credit once the package arrives at our facility and the item(s) are inspected.

Depending on the reason for the return, you may be asked to pay for return-shipping.

@-'-,--

For items that are eligible for a refund:

Send an email to shop@nightchannels.com. INCLUDE YOUR ORDER NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. In the email body, let us know which items you'd like to return. Someone will get back to your within 3-4 business days with instructions on how to complete the return and get your refund.

@-'-,--

INTERNATIONAL RETURNS

At this time we do not accept international returns or exchanges.

@-'-,--

EXCHANGES

Due to constantly fluctuating inventory levels and product availability, we are unable to accept exchanges. If you wish to exchange an item or items, your best option is to return your items for a store credit.

@-'-,--

Items that are ineligible for a refund or exchange:

Returned after 14 days from the day of shipment

Condition of product is unsatisfactory to be resold (stains, pet hair, unpleasant scent, worn, washed)

Items purchased on-site at a festival or event

Please allow 7-10 business days for your return to be verified. You will receive an email confirmation once it has been approved. From there the money will take anywhere from 3-5 business days to be back in your account.
